fold2.heading: A Vision for Elite Experience
fold2.subHeading: Total Environment Plots - Tangled Up in Green
fold2.body1p1: Discover Tangled Up in Green, a vision of Total Environment on the greenery landscapes of Devanahalli. Spread across 115 acres, away from the urban clamour, take advantage of the chance to acquire these luxurious gated community plots in North Bangalore crafted with architectural elegance and environmental consciousness.
fold2.body1p2: This expansive township is strategically located near the Kempogowda International Airport, ensuring easy connectivity. With plot sizes ranging from 1800 sq. ft. to 7200 sq. ft., the project caters to diverse needs. The proximity to Nandi Hills offers breathtaking views that are perfect for nature enthusiasts.
fold2.body1p3: Whether you stroll through the Tree Museum to learn about its taxonomy and history or have a light moment with your neighbours in the lush park, and your experience remains lively. The clubhouse, party area, and amphitheatre bring out the social butterfly in you. Amenities like cycling tracks, sports courts, and a gymnasium promote health and wellness.
fold2.heading2: Tangled Up In Green - Project Highlights
fold2.body2p1: Tangled Up in Green, the new gated community plotted villas in North Bangalore, has plenty of amenities and benefits, highlighting the project's contribution to luxury living and tranquillity. How could premium living blend with the lush living?
fold2.body2p2: This project, approved by RERA, is meticulously designed to offer opulence and style while maintaining ecological responsibility. Learn more about how it promotes luxurious living with tranquillity below -
highlights: BMRDA approval assures reliable infrastructure and amenities, ensuring secure investment and quality living standards in certified layouts.
It is close to Stonehill International School, New Manasa Hospital, KIA, Devanahalli Railway Station, Nandi Hills, and many more.
The 115-acre township has 968 Residential Plots & 4 Commercial Plots ranging from 1800 to 7200sq.ft.
Close proximity to JW Marriot, Foxconn Hon Hai Technology, Decathlon Anubhava, KIA, Devanhalli Business Park and more.
Premium amenities include a yoga deck, eucalyptus grove, playground, cycling track, clubhouse, amphitheatre, and more.

fold4.heading: Tangled Up In Green - Proximities
proximities: 20 Km - Nandi Hills Sunrise/ Sunset Point

fold5.heading: Revealing the Extra Perks of Tangled Up In Green
fold5.body: Owning a plot at Tangled Up In Green, a meticulously crafted villa plotted development project by Total Environment, offers more than a piece of land. Here’s what sets this project apart and distinctive.
fold5.why: Why should Tangled Up In Green be your next choice for acquiring a luxury plot in North Bangalore?

qualities.desc: Total Environment delivers top-notch construction and craftsmanship, encompassing interior finishes, furnishings, cabinetry, and kitchens, along with Lifetime Maintenance assistance.
The aesthetic clubhouse, with a people-centred design, captures and uplifts the spirit of our residents.
Enjoy blissful evenings at our park, and for pet lovers, we've created a separate dog park to enhance your bond with furry friends.
Experience unforgettable entertainment at our amphitheatre with gallery seating, and for lively gatherings, our party area awaits your presence.
Discover tranquillity on our yoga deck, or fuel your active lifestyle on our running tracks—ideal for fitness enthusiasts seeking balance and vigour.

amenities.desc: Buildings built close to each other spare space and improve the neighbours' social understanding.
Stroll along the picturesque cobbled streets for a nostalgic vibe and timeless elegance in your daily walks.
Accompanied by lushful tress on both sides, the avenue roads bring aesthetic beauty as well as refreshing air
Pedal your way to fitness on our scenic cycling track, blending exercise with nature's essence.
Tree Museum, a captivating space celebrating the rich diversity and knowing their history and taxonomy.

fold7.heading: Explore the Premium Amenities at Tangled Up in Green.

siteDevelopment.desc: Boundary walls constructed of masonry or concrete, reaching a height of 1.8 meters.
Roads are built with hand-crafter cobblestones.
A combination of trees, shrubs, and creepers basking in the sunlight offers a breathtaking view.
Street lighting with LED lights on MS Pole.
Day-night CCTV surveillance in streets and common areas.
Sprinklers and drip irrigation systems are installed for landscaped areas.

utilities.desc: Power connections of 4 kVA and 5 kVA are available.
Provision to lay a fibre optic network throughout the gated community.
A sewage treatment plant will be installed to ensure cleanliness.
Percolation pits will be installed at regular intervals to conserve rainwater for future use.
Water will be supplied through a combination of overhead storage tanks.

pros: Nestled within 115 acres of lush greenery, Total Environment Plots in Devanahalli epitomises our commitment to quality. Experience world-class amenities in a nature-themed environment.
The amenities at Tangled Up in Green by Total Environment, including a cycling track, swimming pool, garden, and aesthetic clubhouse, add to an overall premium living experience.
Sewage treatment, rainwater harvesting, and reliable water supply are integral features, ensuring sustainability and enhancing residents' quality of life.
Tranquillity away from city life is experienced, with breathtaking views of lush greenery comprising trees, shrubs, and creepers, fostering peace and relaxation.
Stonehill International School, New Manasa Hospital, KIA, Devanahalli Railway Station, and Nandi Hills are conveniently located nearby for easy access.

faqList.ques: Where is Tangled Up In Green Located?
faqList.ans: Tangled Up In Green is a Total Environment plotted development on Devanahalli, Doddaballapur road.

faqList.ques: What are the available plot sizes and their pricing?
faqList.ans: The available plot sizes range from 1800 - 7200 sq. ft. starting from 1.4C.

faqList.ques: Is Total Environment a reputed real estate developer?
faqList.ans: Yes, Total Environment is a highly regarded real estate developer known for sustainable design and exceptional quality homes.

faqList.ques: Are there any financing options available?
faqList.ans: Yes, There are homeloans approval from multiple banks such as ICICI, SBI and HDFC.

faqList.ques: How good is the connectivity to nearby landmarks?
faqList.ans: Tangled Up in Green is conveniently located near Stonehill International School, New Manasa Hospital, KIA, Devanahalli Railway Station,Nandi Hills and many other landmarks.

faqList.ques: How to book a plot at Tangled Up in Green?
faqList.ans: You could go to our site to schedule a visit, Fill out your details and post the field visit, with all your ID proofs and funds, you could book a plot based on your preference.

faqList.ques: What makes Tangled Up in Green Unique?
faqList.ans: Tangled Up in Green, distinguishes itself through its verdant landscapes and eco-conscious amenities, reflecting Total Environment's commitment to sustainability.

faqList.ques: Will there be any discounts or offers available for this project?
faqList.ans: Certainly! To unlock exclusive discounts and special offers tailored for you, contact us at +919560509669.

faqList.ques: Can I customise my Plot design?
faqList.ans: Absolutely! You can choose your desired plot design from a wide selection, ranging from 30x60 to 60x120 square feet plots.
